attributes.action: Alan Henning to be honoured please
attributes.additional_details:
Alan Henning went to the aid of the needy in Syria race , or religion meant nothing to him , only the desire to help those in need . He went unpaid to help others . If he dosnt deserve the highest award we can give him I don't know what does . Can you please support this petition and let's get a little acknowledgement for Alan's sacrifice .
Thank you
